name: For JFK Assassination Buffs Quiz | U.S. Presidents | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of these men confessed to participating in the assassination?
questions.explanation:
James Files.

	There is a video circulating which contains his confession - but is it credible?

questions.text: Oswald was a supect in a shooting that occurred prior to the JFK assassination. Who was the target of this shooting?
questions.explanation:
General Walker.

	It's still not entirely clear if Oswald participated or what the motive for the shooting was.

questions.text: Who was the chief of the Dallas police at the time of the assassination?
Which author wrote a book entitled 'Case Closed' in support of the 'magic bullet' theory?
What was the name of Jack Ruby's club?
Who interviewed Jack Ruby while he was in prison?
questions.explanation:
Dorothy Kilgallen.

	Kilgallen thought she had turned up some interesting information, but she died before it was disclosed.

questions.text: Oswald's movements prior to the assassination involve activities in which areas?
questions.explanation:
New Orleans and Mexico.

	He was quite active in New Orleans and apparently he also took a trip to Mexico shortly before the assassination.

questions.text: It has been suggested that Kennedy might have been thinking (at the time of the assassination) of dropping Lyndon B. Johnson from the 1964 ticket. This was due (in part) to Johnson's involvement in scandals with two men. What were their names?
questions.explanation:
Baker and Estes.

	Bobby Baker and Billy Sol Estes were major problems for Johnson.

questions.text: Lee Harvey Oswald served in which branch of the U.S. military?
Aside from Kennedy, his wife, and Governor Connally, who was the other passenger of the president's car at the time of the shooting?
